hero.title: Our Story: More Than Just Transport
hero.subtitle: Discover the journey that brought Sunuvan to life and the values that drive us every day.

story.title: Born from a Vision
story.p1: Sunuvan was born from a frustration. Seeing tourist friends struggle with local transport for their tours, and Senegalese families struggling to find reliable and comfortable transport for their events, we realized there was a lack of structured offering.
story.p2: Launched in 2025, Sunuvan bets on service quality and reliability. The name itself is a contraction of "Sunu" which means "Our" in Wolof, and "Van". Literally "Our Van", a brand that evokes a sense of collective ownership, trust, and close service.
story.quote: "At Sunuvan, we don't just drive you from point A to point B. We accompany you so your journey in Senegal becomes an unforgettable experience, from the first kilometer."

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: Offer our clients, whether international or local, a serene, secure, and comfortable transport experience, allowing them to discover Senegal or travel for business without the slightest stress.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: Become the reference for van rental with driver in Senegal, recognized for our professionalism, integrity, and positive contribution to the country's tourist image.

values.title: Our Core Values
values.subtitle: The principles that guide every journey we take with you.

teranga.title: Teranga
teranga.subtitle: Cardinal Value
teranga.description: Senegalese hospitality is not a slogan, it's our way of welcoming each client as an honored guest. We go beyond simple service.

reliability.title: Reliability
reliability.subtitle: Our Promise
reliability.description: We keep our commitments. A vehicle on time, in perfect condition, and a professional driver are our minimum promise.

safety.title: Safety
safety.subtitle: Non-Negotiable
safety.description: Our drivers are rigorously selected and trained, and our vehicles are maintained with the greatest rigor.

excellence.title: Excellence
excellence.subtitle: Our Standard
excellence.description: We always aim to exceed expectations, whether through a small gesture, last-minute flexibility, or informed advice.

differentiators.title: What Makes Sunuvan Different?
differentiators.subtitle: We're not just another transport company. Here's what sets us apart.

formal.title: Professionalization of the Informal Sector
formal.description: Unlike "clandos" and unstructured actors, Sunuvan is a registered company with insurance, contracts, and transparent accounting. Our clients have peace of mind.

ambassadors.title: Our Drivers, True Ambassadors
ambassadors.description: Not just drivers. They are professionals trained in hospitality, discreet, punctual, and with deep knowledge of the terrain. They are the face of our Teranga.

turnkey.title: Turnkey & Customizable Service
turnkey.description: We don't sell an A-to-B trip, we sell a solution. We build the itinerary with you, suggest stops, and adapt to your unforeseen events.

bridge.title: The Bridge Between Worlds
bridge.description: We understand both international tourist expectations (comfort, punctuality) and local client realities (family needs, events). We speak both languages, literally and figuratively.

cta.title: Ready to Experience Teranga on Wheels?
cta.description: Book your journey today and discover what makes Sunuvan the trusted choice for transportation in Senegal.

hero.title: Travel with Excellence
hero.subtitle: Premium transportation service in Senegal
hero.description: Experience comfort and reliability with our modern fleet and professional drivers. From Dakar to Saint-Louis, we take you everywhere in style.

fleet.title: Our Premium Fleet
fleet.subtitle: Modern, well-maintained vehicles for every need. From intimate transfers to large group adventures.
fleet.empty: No vehicles available at the moment

services.title: Services & Pricing
services.subtitle: Transparent, all-inclusive pricing for every journey. A fair price for excellent service.

transfers.title: Standard Transfers
transfers.description: Door-to-door transfer service for airport pickups, hotel transfers, and point-to-point journeys.

daily.title: Daily Rental
daily.description: Full-day rental with professional driver. Perfect for sightseeing, business meetings, or family outings.

tours.title: Tours & Excursions
tours.description: Discover Senegal's treasures with our guided tour packages. Customizable itineraries available.

events.title: Event Services
events.description: Special transportation for weddings, baptisms, family reunions, and celebrations.

corporate.title: Corporate Services
corporate.description: Professional transportation solutions for businesses. Delegation transfers, seminars, and monthly contracts.

surprises.title: No Surprises
surprises.description: Detailed, firm quote before any reservation

hidden.title: No Hidden Fees
hidden.description: Everything included in the announced price

flexible.title: Flexible Payment
flexible.description: 30% deposit, balance at end of service

options.title: Payment Options
options.description: Cash, Mobile Money (Orange, Wave), Bank Transfer

terms.title: Clear & Fair Conditions
terms.subtitle: We believe in transparency. Here are our terms clearly laid out.

reservation.title: Reservation & Payment
reservation.l2: Balance: Payment at end of service to driver
reservation.l3: Methods: Cash, Mobile Money, Bank Transfer

commitment.title: Sunuvan Commitment
commitment.l1: Punctuality: Vehicle present at agreed time/place
commitment.l2: Cleanliness & Comfort: Clean vehicle, optimal fuel/AC
commitment.l3: Safety: Professional driver, perfect vehicle condition
commitment.l4: Flexibility: Adapt to reasonable unforeseen events

airport.title: Airport Transfers
airport.description: Punctual service to/from Blaise Diagne airport

hero.title: Frequently Asked Questions
hero.description: Find answers to common questions about our services, booking process, and policies.

faq.noResults: No questions found matching your search.

cta.title: Still Have Questions?
cta.description: Can't find the answer you're looking for? Our team is here to help.

booking.title: Booking Process
booking.q1: How do I book a van?
booking.a1: You can book through our website by filling out the contact form, or reach us directly via phone or WhatsApp. We'll provide a detailed quote within 2 hours during business hours.
booking.q2: What information do you need for a quote?
booking.a2: We need your travel dates, number of passengers, pickup and drop-off locations, and any special requirements.
booking.q3: How far in advance should I book?
booking.a3: We recommend booking at least 48 hours in advance for standard transfers, and 1-2 weeks ahead for tours or events.
booking.q4: Can I modify my booking after confirmation?
booking.a4: Yes, modifications are free subject to availability. Please inform us as soon as possible about any changes.

pricing.title: Pricing & Payment
pricing.a1: All our prices include: professional driver, fuel, tolls, insurance, parking fees, and fresh water. No hidden fees.
pricing.q2: What payment methods do you accept?
pricing.a2: We accept cash (FCFA, EUR), Mobile Money (Orange Money, Wave), and bank transfers. A 30% deposit confirms your booking.
pricing.q3: Do you offer discounts for long-term rentals?
pricing.a3: Yes, we offer special rates for weekly and monthly rentals, as well as corporate contracts.
pricing.a4: Tips are not included and are entirely at your discretion. They are appreciated but never expected.

services.title: Services
services.a1: We cover the entire Senegalese territory, from airport transfers to multi-day tours across the country.
services.q2: Can I modify my itinerary during the trip?
services.a2: Absolutely! Flexibility is one of our core values. Just communicate with your driver.
services.a3: Yes, upon request. Please specify ages when booking.
services.q4: Can you arrange airport pickups for late-night flights?
services.a4: Yes, we operate 24/7 for airport transfers and monitor flight arrivals.

vehicles.title: Vehicles & Drivers
vehicles.q1: What types of vehicles do you have?
vehicles.a1: Our fleet includes standard vans, premium vans (Mercedes V-Class), and minibuses. All air-conditioned and insured.
vehicles.q2: Are your drivers licensed and insured?
vehicles.a2: Absolutely. All drivers are professionally licensed, insured, and trained in hospitality.
vehicles.a3: All drivers speak fluent French. Many also speak English.
vehicles.a4: Premium vans include WiFi. For others, it can be arranged upon request.

terms.title: Terms & Conditions
terms.a1: Cancellation > 48h: full refund. 24-48h: 50% refund. < 24h: non-refundable deposit.
terms.q2: What happens if my flight is delayed?
terms.a2: We monitor flights. No extra charge for reasonable delays.
terms.q3: Is there a waiting time included?
terms.a3: Airport: 60 mins included. Other: 15 mins included.
terms.q4: What if there's a vehicle breakdown?
terms.a4: We immediately dispatch a replacement vehicle.

differentiators.title: Why Choose Sunuvan?

serenity.title: All-Inclusive Serenity
serenity.subtitle: We handle everything, you enjoy everything

expertise.title: Chauffeur-Ambassador Expertise

flexibility.title: Absolute Flexibility

comfort.title: Comfort & Safety

comfort.description: Spacious, air-conditioned, and rigorously maintained vans. Calm driving and perfect road knowledge.

culture.title: Bridge Between Worlds
culture.subtitle: Understanding international expectations
culture.description: Professionalism and comfort for tourists combined with authenticity and understanding of local realities.

coverage.title: We Cover All of Senegal
coverage.subtitle: From airport transfers to multi-day adventures, we take you everywhere in Senegal with comfort and reliability.
coverage.noteDetail: From 30km transfers to 1500km tours over 10 days
